title: LOVE O'CLOCK
lyrics:
Balobalo Twe Twe Twelve O'Clock
Tic Tic jeomjeom dagawa
Modeun ge da bakkwieobeolin mabeob-ui segye
Sijagdoeneun Love Love Love O'Clock
Oneulbam-eun nalnal jikyeojwo

Jjalishan ne son-eul jabgo nal-abwa Fly Fly



Gidalyeossdeon sigan-i wass-eo

Bimilseuleobge (Secret)

Mollae Wake up Wake up

Oneulbam-iya (Follow)

Deulline isanghan soli mwolkka kkeulline

Jogeumman deo dagaga bolkka eomeona



Bamhaneul-e hana dulssig kkaeeona (Idols)

Jeonbu kkum-inga hyeonsil-inga hesgallyeo (ige mwoya)

Nun-eul ttel su eobsneun nega na-ege (mal-eul hae)

Uliga mannal sigan-iya



Balobalo Twe Twe Twelve O'Clock

Tic Tic jeomjeom dagawa

Modeun ge da bakkwieobeolin mabeob-ui segye



Sijagdoeneun Love Love Love O'Clock

Oneulbam-eun nalnal jikyeojwo

Jjalishan ne son-eul jabgo nal-abwa Fly Fly



Eotteohge neol nohchil su iss-eo nae son kkog jab-a

Jomdeo Wait up Wait up

Oneulbam-iya (gidalyeo on)

Kkumsog gip-i jael su eobsneun isanghan segye

Jogeumman deo gidalyeo bolkka

Eonjekkaji neoman-eul neoman-eul



Bamhaneul-e hana dulssig kkaeeona (Idols)

Jeonbu kkum-ilkka hyeonsil-ilkka hesgallyeo (ige mwoya)

Nun-eul ttel su eobsneun nega na-ege (mal-eul hae)

Uliga mannal sigan-ilae



Balobalo Twe Twe Twelve O'Clock

Tic Tic jeomjeom dagawa

Modeun ge da bakkwieobeolin mabeob-ui segye



Sijagdoeneun Love Love Love O'Clock

Oneulbam-eun nalnal jikyeojwo

Jjalishan ne son-eul jabgo nal-abwa Fly Fly



Ne son-eul jabgo jeogi haneul nop-i

Moduga nolladolog keep on rolling

Dosiui bulbichdeul-i anboyeo

Hey neowa dulman gadeughan bam

Bam blah bam simjang-i bul-anhan mam

Beolsseo huh kkeutnamyeon Oh no

Han bakwiman deo dolja Na na

Zzz monglonghae na



Mabeob-i pulligo naneun tto dasi

Idaelo jamdeulgin silh-eo

Jebal gajima jijima nal wihae

Yeong-wonhi Love with you



Balobalo Twe Twe Twelve O'Clock

Tic Tic jeomjeom dagawa

Modeun ge da bakkwieobeolin mabeob-ui segye



Sijagdoeneun Love Love Love O'Clock

Oneulbam-eun nalnal jikyeojwo

Jjalishan ne son-eul jabgo nal-abwa Fly Fly
